name: Rock to forget
description:
Try to keep stress indicator in center or you won't know what to play.

Controls:

  • WASD - to catch arrows
  • QE or Left arrow / Right arrow to control stress (you suppose to keep it in the middle)
  • SPACE or mouse click to restart 

The songs I badly covered for this game:

  • Nirvana -- Lithium
  • Blur -- Song 2
  • The White Stripes -- Fell in Love With a Girl

That is my first jam so hope you'll like what I've done for it.
